metadata.description:
POWER RABI WITH ERROR AMPLIFICATION
This sequence involves repeatedly executing the qubit pulse (such as x180) 'N' times and
measuring the state of the resonator across different qubit pulse amplitudes and number of pulses.
By doing so, the effect of amplitude inaccuracies is amplified, enabling a more precise measurement of the pi pulse
amplitude. The results are then analyzed to determine the qubit pulse amplitude suitable for the selected duration.

Prerequisites:
    - Having calibrated the mixer or the Octave (nodes 01a or 01b).
    - Having calibrated the qubit frequency (node 03a_qubit_spectroscopy.py).
    - Having set the qubit gates duration (qubit.xy.operations["x180"].length).
    - Having specified the desired flux point if relevant (qubit.z.flux_point).

State update:
    - The qubit pulse amplitude corresponding to the specified operation (x180, x90...) 
    (qubit.xy.operations[operation].amplitude).
metadata.name: 04b_power_rabi

qubits.description: A list of qubit names which should participate in the execution of the node. Default is None.
qubits.title: Qubits

multiplexed.description:
Whether to play control pulses, readout pulses and active/thermal reset at the same time for all qubits (True)
or to play the experiment sequentially for each qubit (False). Default is False.
multiplexed.title: Multiplexed

use_state_discrimination.description:
Whether to use on-the-fly state discrimination and return the qubit 'state', or simply return the demodulated
quadratures 'I' and 'Q'. Default is False.
use_state_discrimination.title: Use State Discrimination

reset_type.description:
The qubit reset method to use. Must be implemented as a method of Quam.qubit. Can be "thermal", "active", or
"active_gef". Default is "thermal".
reset_type.title: Reset Type

num_shots.description: Number of averages to perform. Default is 50.
num_shots.title: Num Shots

operation.description: Type of operation to perform. Default is "x180".
operation.title: Operation

min_amp_factor.description: Minimum amplitude factor for the operation. Default is 0.001.
min_amp_factor.title: Min Amp Factor

max_amp_factor.description: Maximum amplitude factor for the operation. Default is 1.99.
max_amp_factor.title: Max Amp Factor

amp_factor_step.description: Step size for the amplitude factor. Default is 0.005.
amp_factor_step.title: Amp Factor Step

max_number_pulses_per_sweep.description: Maximum number of Rabi pulses per sweep. Default is 1.
max_number_pulses_per_sweep.title: Max Number Pulses Per Sweep

update_x90.description: Flag to update the x90 pulse amplitude. Default is True.
update_x90.title: Update X90

simulate.description: Simulate the waveforms on the OPX instead of executing the program. Default is False.
simulate.title: Simulate

simulation_duration_ns.description: Duration over which the simulation will collect samples (in nanoseconds). Default is 50_000 ns.
simulation_duration_ns.title: Simulation Duration Ns

use_waveform_report.description: Whether to use the interactive waveform report in simulation. Default is True.
use_waveform_report.title: Use Waveform Report

timeout.description: Waiting time for the OPX resources to become available before giving up (in seconds). Default is 120 s.
timeout.title: Timeout

load_data_id.description: Optional QUAlibrate node run index for loading historical data. Default is None.
load_data_id.title: Load Data Id
